message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as you know the value is high for you. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. This is my best offer so far, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

Bob, I understand your position and appreciate your offer. While I'm willing to negotiate, $1,300,000 is still a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $1,350,000? This is a fair compromise and a good deal for both of us. Let's make this work!

I appreciate your persistence, but $1,350,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,250,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
